name: medama
description: Medama is a UI-first, self-hosted error tracking and monitoring tool for developers. It offers stack traces, session replay, and alerts to help diagnose issues in applications without relying on external services.
features: Error tracking: Capture and log application errors with detailed stack traces and context.
Session replay: Record and replay user sessions to understand how errors occurred.
Alert system: Configure notifications for critical errors via email, Slack, or webhooks.
Source map support: Automatically map minified code to original source for easier debugging.
User context: Track which users experienced errors with custom user identification.
Environment filtering: Separate errors by environment like production, staging, or development.
Issue grouping: Automatically group similar errors to reduce noise and identify patterns.
Performance monitoring: Track application performance metrics alongside error data.
Search and filtering: Find specific errors using filters for time, severity, or affected users.
Privacy focused: Self-hosted solution keeps sensitive error data under your control.
SDK support: Integrate with JavaScript, Python, Ruby, and other language SDKs.
Dashboard analytics: View error trends, affected users, and resolution status at a glance.
